instructions.title: How to use
instructions.rotate: Rotate the pages of your PDF by a specified degree (require PDF upload first).
instructions.extractPages: Extract selected pages from your PDF into a new file (require PDF upload first).
instructions.mergePdfs: Combine multiple PDF files into a single document.
instructions.splitPdf: Split your PDF into separate files by page number (require PDF upload first).
instructions.imagesToPdf: Convert one or more images into a PDF document.
instructions.addPageNumbers: Add sequential page numbers to each page of your PDF (require PDF upload first).
instructions.addWatermark: Overlay a semi-transparent watermark on every page of your PDF (require PDF upload first).
instructions.removePages: Remove specific pages from your PDF (require PDF upload first).
instructions.urlToPdf: Fetch a web page by URL and save it as a PDF.
instructions.compressPdf: Reduce the file size of your PDF by applying compression (require PDF upload first).

pdfServices.title: 10 PDF Services
pdfServices.description: Our app provides 10 services for working with PDF files. Some require you to upload a PDF into the designated drop-zone first, others work immediately. Each service lists the exact steps you need to follow.

history.title: History (Admin only)
history.description: Only administrators can view the full history of actions, clear it with the “Clear History” button or export it as CSV via “Download CSV”.

login.title: User Login
login.description: On the Login screen, existing users enter their username and password to access the application. If you do not already have an account, click “Register”.

registration.title: User Registration
registration.description: On the Registration screen, new users create an account by selecting a username, email and password. Once submitted, you will receive a verification email - click the link in it to verify your address. Once verified, return here to log in.

language.title: Language Switching
language.description: Switch between English and Slovensky on the fly - no page reload needed.

login.step4: Click Login or choose Register if you don’t have an account.

registration.step1: Go to the Log In page.
registration.step2: Enter a username, email and password.
